results.name: wordpress-site/wordpress-7d87445ddc-7r4hh

error.Text: Readiness probe failed: HTTP probe failed with statuscode: 500

results.details:
Error: The readiness probe failed because the application returned a 500 status code, indicating an internal server error.

Solution: 
1. Check application logs for errors.
2. Ensure all dependencies are running.
3. Verify configuration settings.
4. Restart the application.

results.name: wordpress-site/wordpress

error.Text: Service has not ready endpoints, pods: [Pod/wordpress-7d87445ddc-7r4hh], expected 1

results.details:
Error: The service is missing ready endpoints because the pod 'wordpress-7d87445ddc-7r4hh' isn't ready.  
Solution: 1. Check pod status with `kubectl get pods`. 2. Describe pod for issues using `kubectl describe pod wordpress-7d87445ddc-7r4hh`. 3. Fix any errors (e.g., image pull, readiness probe). 4. Restart pod if needed.
